dr_strategy.gaps: No information provided on disaster recovery strategy, regional redundancy, backup regions, or DR testing.

backups.gaps: No details on backup frequency, encryption, retention, or isolation from primary systems.

failover_design.gaps: No description of multi-region deployment, load balancing, standby configurations, or automated failover.

rto_rpo.gaps: No RTO/RPO commitments or guarantees in SLA/SLO documentation mentioned.

continuity_comms.gaps: No information on status pages, incident updates, customer notifications, or transparency obligations.

governance.gaps: No mention of DR governance, business continuity planning, or regular audits/exercises.

weaknesses: Complete lack of documentation on all evaluated criteria.
